content:
Let's add a reminder to prepare for your online meetings 30 minutes before they start.

**Reminders**

* Set reminders for:
	+ Yoga class (7:40 AM)
	+ Lunch break (12:00 PM)
	+ **Prepare for online meeting (1:30 PM, Tuesdays and Thursdays)**
	+ Online meeting (Tuesdays and Thursdays, 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM)
	+ Morning tasks (e.g., exercise, meditation)
	+ Work/School tasks (e.g., meetings, deadlines)
	+ Evening tasks (e.g., exercise, hobby)
	+ Wind down routine (e.g., start winding down at 9:00 PM)

By setting a reminder 30 minutes before your online meetings, you'll have time to:

* Get settled and comfortable
* Check your equipment and internet connection
* Review any materials or notes you need to discuss
* Take a few deep breaths and mentally prepare for the meeting

This should help you feel more prepared and confident going into your online meetings.

Remember to adjust the reminder time according to your specific needs and preferences. If you need more or less time to prepare, simply adjust the reminder accordingly.
